examples: he has a feel for animals
it's easy when you get the feel of it

definitions.text: the general atmosphere of a place or situation and the effect that it has on people
examples: the feel of the city excited him
a clergyman improved the tone of the meeting
it had the smell of treason

definitions.text: manual stimulation of the genital area for sexual pleasure
examples: the girls hated it when he tried to sneak a feel

definitions.text: undergo an emotional sensation or be in a particular state of mind
examples: She felt resentful
He felt regret

definitions.text: come to believe on the basis of emotion, intuitions, or indefinite grounds
examples: I feel that he doesn't like me
I find him to be obnoxious
I found the movie rather entertaining

definitions.text: perceive by a physical sensation, e.g., coming from the skin or muscles
examples: He felt the wind
She felt an object brushing her arm
He felt his flesh crawl
She felt the heat when she got out of the car

definitions.text: be conscious of a physical, mental, or emotional state
examples: My cold is gone--I feel fine today
She felt tired after the long hike
She felt sad after her loss

definitions.text: have a feeling or perception about oneself in reaction to someone's behavior or attitude
examples: She felt small and insignificant
You make me feel naked
I made the students feel different about themselves
We felt the effects of inflation
her fingers felt their way through the string quartet
she felt his contempt of her

definitions.text: be felt or perceived in a certain way
examples: The ground feels shaky
The sheets feel soft

definitions.text: grope or feel in search of something
examples: He felt for his wallet
Feel this soft cloth!
The customer fingered the sweater
The nurse palpated the patient's stomach
The runner felt her pulse

definitions.text: find by testing or cautious exploration
examples: He felt his way around the dark room
It feels nice to be home again

definitions.text: pass one's hands over the sexual organs of
examples: He felt the girl in the movie theater
